mention.text: the chilean human rights committee , which is headed by lawyer jaime castillo velasco and maximo pacheco , who was education minister during president eduardo frei 's administration
a public petition requesting him to explain to the country some serious crimes , which can not be denied , that occurred during his term in office
the concern of the chilean people regarding these crimes

the petition , which is addressed to mr augusto pinochet ugarte -- appointed president of the republic for another period of government and the highest executive branch representative for the past 15 years --
the petition also requests clarification on cases of people who inexplicably have been missing since their arrest for reasons still unknown .
